body_html:
The installation guide includes this warning:
"The Anaconda installation is community supported, not officially supported."

You might try the pip install, or see whether you can get help with the conda install on stackoverflow.

You might try the pip install, or see whether you can get help with the conda install on stackoverflow.
body:
The installation guide includes this warning:
 "The Anaconda installation is community supported, not officially supported."

You might try the pip install, or see whether you can get help with the conda install on stackoverflow.
